name: Interest in science, by country: 2018

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_tried_to_get_information_about_science_in_the_past_30_days
variableMeasured.description: Tried To Get Information About Science In The Past 30 Days

variableMeasured.name: field_tried_to_get_information_about_medicine_disease_or_health_in_the_past_30_days
variableMeasured.description: Tried To Get Information About Medicine Disease Or Health In The Past 30 Days

variableMeasured.name: field_would_like_to_know_more_about_science
variableMeasured.description: Would Like To Know More About Science

variableMeasured.name: field_would_like_to_know_more_about_medicine_disease_or_health
variableMeasured.description: Would Like To Know More About Medicine Disease Or Health

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Countries are those with top 16 gross domestic expenditures on R&D as a percentage of gross domestic product in 2017, listed in order from highest to lowest (see Indicators 2022 report "Research and Development: U.S. Trends and International Comparisons"). Responses are to the following: Have you, personally, tried to get any information about science in the past 30 days? Have you, personally, tried to get any information about medicine, disease, or health in the past 30 days? Would you, personally, like to know more about science? Would you, personally, like to know more about medicine, disease, or health?
sources: Gallup. 2019. Wellcome Global Monitor 2018.Science and Engineering Indicators
